name: Format\ConditionalTableRowStyle
description: The object for applying styles to table rows that meet certain conditions.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The background color for the row.

properties.name: divider
properties.description: The stroke style for the divider line below the row.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the row, as an integer in points, or using one of the available units of measure for components. See Specifying Measurements for Components.

properties.name: selectors
properties.description: An array of one or more selectors, each of which specifies one or more conditions.
